mapper.select: select hst_id, hst_brd_id, hst_approved_at, hst_approved_by, hst_status, ( select cod_name from tbl_aprv_code where cod_id = hst_status ) as hst_status_name from tbl_aprv_history where hst_brd_id = #{ brd_id }

select brd_id, brd_content, brd_title, brd_status, ( select usr_name from tbl_aprv_user where usr_id = brd_created_by ) as brd_created_name, ( select cod_name from tbl_aprv_code where cod_id = brd_status ) as brd_status_name from tbl_aprv_board where brd_id = #{ brd_id }
